EmailTemplate.name: Trainee separation notification - trainee - no supervisor
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You separated from {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c}. Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is inactive.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You separated from {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You can no longer gain experience hours under this supervisor.
Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is inactive.
You must accept an invitation from another supervisor to activate your license and gain experience hours.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI035
